contents:
I'm really not
feeling it right
now...

This guy... I should
report him online as
a Menace.

I wonder if someone
could cover my
shift...

Wonder if there's
anything new on
Divine Justice.

That ramen shop in
Shinjuku is getting
a lot of buzz.
Error: tnxotb-[6]
Error: tnxotb-[7]
Error: tnxotb-[8]

What are they
doing here?

They don't seem to
know anything.
Ugh...
This sucks, man...
What should I do...

Sticking around here
isn't so bad,
really...

What was my name,
again?

I can't remember
anything... I'm just
trapped here...

I hope these days
will never end.

This sucks. I just
wanna go home and
hit the sack.

Ooh, something's
going down on
Divine Justice.

The café over
there is really
good...

The doctor at that
clinic is real
strange...

What should I do
for dinner?

I really want to
pull a rare figure.

Old movies aren't
bad. What's showing
next month?

Whoa! Someone broke
the record at the
batting cages?

Think I'll visit
the bookstore.

Wonder if there's
anything good on
TV tonight.
Booored.

Ugh! Why does
everything have to
be so annoying?

That must've been
really tough!
Did you hear that?

Shhh, someone will
hear you!
Really? Seriously?
What's that?
I know!
Really?
What happened?
So tired...
Booored.
Ugh...
*sigh*
There's too many...

Did you read it?
The article.

Kiuchi's pitch got
hit by some kid.
No way, right?

He told that
reporter it was
a real pitch...

Huh? So that was the
best he could do?

If it's true, that's
pretty abysmal.

Yeah. But you know
what he said after?

"I didn't really try
because no women
were watching"!

Hahaha! Seriously?
Still, losing to a
kid? Pathetic!

He always talks so
big, but he might
really be weak.

He may stand out on
our team, but he's
not all that.

If he does make it
to majors, he won't
last long.

We should stop
talking. If someone
overhears us...

Those guys...
Are they joking!?

Talking shit behind
my back!?

How dare they laugh
at me... Screw those
bastards!

Sato-senpai is
definitely our
MVP, but...

Doesn't he have
any weaknesses?
Oh right...

Apparently, he once
heard a loud bang
and fainted.

Hiih...
Haah...

I wonder how
Kiuchi-sama's
doing...

Kiuchi-sama...
Where is he, anyway?

He's the only one
not here yet.

I don't feel like
doing much lately...

I don't want to do
anything. It's all
so boring...

Why do I have to
fill in this
dumb form?

I haven't thought
about the future
at all...

I wouldn't mind
staying home and
doing nothing.

Go into the family
business, or set off
on my own. Hm...

A lot of students
are skipping school
these days.

I can't focus
at all.

Why do I have to
study so much?

Class is
too hard.

Seems like everyone
goes on Divine
Justice lately.

What is there to
even gain from being
a Menace?

I wonder if I
can still get
yakisoba bread.

That was Noge-san
just now, right?
Cute as always...

There's a scary guy
on the rooftop...

I'm sleepy. Maybe a
nap will make me
feel better.

Afternoon classes
are such a drag.

I wanna go lie
down somewhere...

This weather's
perfect for a
lunchtime walk.

Arai-san and
Noge-san make quite
a pair, huh?

Someone was shoved
violently at
the station!

I wonder if Noge-san
is okay...

Who would do
such a thing?
That's terrible.

No updates from
Divine Justice yet.

An accident? I hope
everyone's okay...

Things feel really
dangerous lately.

Damn... I had a
shift today,
didn't I?

Maybe I should buy
some new clothes.
Ah... I'm tired...

The airsoft shop guy
doesn't look like
a civilian...

Looks like a new
movie is coming out.

I hope these days
will never end.

The Subway Slammer
was once a pro
baseball player?

Takeyuki Kiuchi?
Who's that?

Were there really
this many victims?

That bastard Kiuchi.
I hope he rots in
jail for life.

Food reviews these
days are pretty
entertaining.

I hear
Victory Kitchen
is pretty good.

Ah... I'm craving
Chinese food...

All he did was shove
people. How is that
newsworthy?

No news from
Divine Justice...

I saw Noge-san earlier.
I hope she's doing
okay now.

When will Heritage
Kitchen reopen?

Do food critics
really have that
much influence?

Arai-san's been
hanging out with
boys a lot...

The internet's
so boring lately.

I wanna go home
and play games.

I heard
that food critic
apologized.

Do you think those
shops that closed
can reopen?

There haven't been
any good anime
lately...

Heritage Kitchen was
really delicious.

I'm tired. I feel
sleep-deprived
every day.

Hey! What are you
looking at?
Wait...

We can't trust
everything food
influencers say.

Let's go back to
that old shop!

Huh? You have
that figure!?

What the heck is
an "educational
advisor"?

The new teacher
seems pretty good.

I don't really like
that new teacher...

Where should we go
after school today?

I saw a great new
anime. You should
check it out!

The new teacher? Oh,
I was distracted by
Riko-senpai...

Wanna head home
together?
Hey, wait up!

The new teacher is
so hot... Should I
talk to him?

That must've been
really tough!
Did you hear that?

Shhh, someone will
hear you!
Really? Seriously?
What's that?
I know!
Really?
What happened?
So tired...
Booored.
Ugh...
*sigh*
There's too many...
Not bad...

It's too crowded.
I can't shop
like this.

This store is
so last season.

Whoa! Who can afford
to spend this much
on clothes?

That movie was
pretty good.
Wanna go to karaoke?

I'm hungry.
Let's go eat.

My muscles are
killing me. I've
been slacking.

Is this line just
for the fitting
room?

The airsoft shop
over there is
real cool.

A lot of people got
hurt by the Subway
Slammer, huh?

He's not here,
is he?

Ouch... It still hurts
where he hit me...

I heard he hangs
around the station.

That's seriously
traumatizing.

Why hasn't he
been arrested?

Uh... This tastes
strange. I don't
like it.

Isn't there a nicer
restaurant nearby?

I wonder which books
are popular lately.

That guy's
pretty cute.

Can you believe what
they sell in vending
machines now?
Let's go eat crêpes.

The gym trainer
seems a bit strange.

I want to stop at
the drugstore on the
way home.

I heard a student
got injured
recently...

Someone got pushed
on the tracks! Hope
they're okay...

When are they going
to catch him?

I hope that girl
is all right...

I'm too scared
to go out into
the city now...

He only attacks
women. It's
terrifying...

I don't even have an
appetite anymore...

The underground
mall's got new
clothes in stock!

Where should I get
a part-time job?

Oh no! I'm going
to be late for
my shift!

I'm exhausted.
Think I'll go to the
bathhouse.

There's always
students studying
at the diner.

The manager of
the airsoft shop
is scary...

How long should
we practice today?

Didn't they see him
on the security
cameras?

The police should
do something soon.

I wonder if
Magatsukami knows
who he is.

I've been so busy
lately, I haven't
had a break...

I want to
go on a trip.

Why aren't you
answering the phone?

My entire body is
covered in grilled
meat stink.
I can't relax...

They finally caught
that guy.

Why would a baseball
player do something
like that...?

Yes! They finally
got him!

Now I don't have to
be so scared to go
out anymore.

Huh? He turned
himself in?

He came forward?
He didn't get
caught?

I wonder how long
his sentence is
gonna be.

There's a good ramen
shop in Shinjuku.

Ooh, a fortune
teller in Shinjuku
you say?

The ramen at
Victory Kitchen
is really good.

That gourmet food
critic is popular
these days.

No new stores are
opening lately...

That bastard should
have been caught a
long time ago.

It's nice to be able
to go about the city
without fear.

I hope he spends the
rest of his life
behind bars.

This place is
delicious! Why's the
rating so bad?

Wait, is that
critic just making
stuff up?

Take online reviews
with a massive pinch
of salt.

Let's go eat at
that new shop.

These reviews are
glowing... Were they
paid off?

Wow, it looks really
delicious in
the photo.

I heard that shop is
collaborating with a
gourmet critic.

These two review
scores are totally
different...

Let's go get
something to drink.

Who would want to go
up against a gourmet
food critic?

Haha, that pose!
Is he trying to look
like a samurai?

A Food Fight, huh?
Sounds interesting.

Has it really been
that long since the
incident...?

This place has
gotten a lot of bad
reviews lately.

This is delicious!
I've gotta bookmark
this place...

So it was Miyazawa's
fault that store
shut down!?

Even if you said
sorry, we don't have
to forgive you!

Miyazawa's a Menace?
But his show was
so good...

Does anyone actually
believe what food
critics say?

Avoid anywhere
Miyazawa recommends
like the plague.

Don't listen to what
others say. As long
as you like it...

I can't believe
people like Miyazawa
actually exist.

A new restaurant's
opening soon. I
wanna try it.

The food I cook
myself is the
most delicious.

I want Chinese
food today.

I heard there was
an owl here during
the day!

Finally finished
work...

I feel exhausted
every day...

Should we grab a
drink somewhere?

I'm working every
day and have no
time for myself.

Guess I'm spending
the night at an
internet café.

That girl's amazing
at guitar.

Why doesn't that
girl with the guitar
sell CDs?

Let's ask Shichi-kun
if he knows any new
shops nearby!

Almost home! Snacks
and a cold beer are
waiting for me!

I don't want
to go home...

I'm so sick of the
same old routine...

We reached our sales
quota for the month!
Let's celebrate!

I heard there's
a kid with a pet owl
around here.

It seems unsafe
around here lately.

I hope I
get scouted...

Someone got shoved
here in broad
daylight.

Would anyone really
slam into people
on purpose?

I heard the Subway
Slammer's just some
office worker.

Why would someone
slam into people?
It's so scary.

Every shop feels
short-staffed now.

I see a young girl
with a donation box
here sometimes.

Shichi-kun's working
late every day...

Why isn't the mascot
a cat?

Let's hurry home.
It's been dangerous
here lately.

This is the time we
agreed on. Where
are they?

It's our first time
meeting. Hmm, what
are they like?

That Subway Slammer
actually injured
someone?

Aren't there any
police officers at
the station?

I dropped
my wallet...

I heard the train
stopped. What
happened...?

The world is getting
more dangerous
every day.

That girl who was
pushed on the tracks
is in hospital.

I wonder if they'll
catch the Subway
Slammer soon.

I think I'll have my
boyfriend come
pick me up.

I'm too scared
to walk alone.

I heard he only
targets women.
How disgusting.

It's not even in the
news, and there's no
info online...

If I meet him, I'll
make sure he
regrets it.
I'm hungry...

Let's go to the
underground mall
at the station.

The underground mall
might have a good
gift for her...

Let's go buy
some flowers.

I want a new pair
of sneakers...

Let's just eat
something.

I heard the
convenience store
is hiring.

I got it!
Let's get
sushi today!
I want dumplings...

I should clean, but
I get tired just
thinking of it.

The new release is
out! I'm staying
up all night!

Has that girl gotten
even better?

Why hasn't she
been scouted?

Does anyone even use
phone booths
these days?

When will I ever
win first prize?

I want to pet the
pigeons, but they
always fly away.

There's a really
cute chubby cat
in Zoshigaya.

I wish I
had a cat...

I haven't seen that
half-Japanese
girl today.

Man, school was fun.
Aside from tests and
being broke...

Come on, I gotta win
someday... This is
so frustrating!

I heard he was
caught right here.

I saw when he was
caught. He was just
a normal guy.

Didn't the people
who got shoved
report it?

Let's just go to a
place with
solid reviews.

I can finally
rest at ease.

I guess the police
can do their job
after all.

It took them way too
long to catch him.

Did you hear? The
guy who slammed into
you was caught.

Did that really
warrant a special
news report?

What was the name of
Miyazawa's channel
again?

This place seems to
have good ratings.
Let's eat here.

How'd they get such
good reviews? The
service stinks.

Wasn't that gourmet
review show on
today?

That's fake, right?
No way it looks like
the photo.

Nothing beats the
usual go-to!

There are too many
people making food
review videos.

A one-year wait for
a reservation?
Unbelievable.

Every store
has a line.

Let's just go get
ramen from
Victory Kitchen.

When will that shop
in Zoshigaya reopen?

Oh, Miyazawa just
posted some kind of
announcement.

I want to eat fine
cuisine from all
over the world.

Diet first... Then I'm
gonna go all out
at a buffet!

I want to be
a gourmet critic too.

Nothing beats a
hearty home-cooked
meal.

Let's go to
Shinjuku.

Maybe I'm cursed...
Should I get my
fortune told?

That fortune teller
Chihaya in Shinjuku
is pretty cute.

I have zero
appetite... Maybe
it's stress.

I wonder when I'll
be able to take
a break...

There's been so many
new shops opening
here lately.

Online shopping is
so convenient.

If I had a boyfriend,
he would carry my
bags for me...

These clothes
are so cute!

Miyazawa's channel
is gonna bite
the dust now!

Without Miyazawa's
reviews, I dunno
what to eat...

As awful as Miyazawa
was, food reviews do
come in handy.

That restaurant was
great! I gotta post
pics online.

I want to eat
something delicious.

I've been waiting
for a while now...
Where are you?
What should I eat?

I've been to all the
shops around here...

Chinese food really
is the best
after all.

I'm gonna sing
until dawn!

Let's check out
that shop.

Sorry to keep
you waiting.

That girl's reading
people's fortunes.
Is she legit?

A fortune teller?
Hmm...

Hey, why are you
still not here...

Let's go to
the bookstore.

There's a lot of
food review streams
these days.

I'll stop at the
convenience store
on my way home.

It's always crowded
here no matter what
time you come.

Which shop should
I go to today?

I'm drinking
tonight!

Choosing is a
hassle. Let's just
pick any place.

That Subway Slammer
never came to
Shinjuku, huh.

I've never run into
him, but I'm glad he
was arrested.

I've only seen stuff
about the Subway
Slammer online.

There are some real
sickos out there.

I'm in a
good mood today...

Oh no! I'm gonna be
late for my date!

What should
I get her...?

I won't make it in
time... But taxis are
expensive...

The Subway Slammer
has become quite
a hot topic.

Didn't the victims
report it to
the police?

I don't care
anymore...

My luck's no good
lately. Maybe I'll
go to a shrine.

This place has a
low rating. Let's go
somewhere else.

Takeyuki Kiuchi...
The former baseball
pro, right?

Didn't Takeyuki
Kiuchi use to coach
little league?

I went to one of
those! Can't believe
what he did.

Why are you
always late?

I wonder if there's
a perfect place for
a date...

My heart races every
time I see you.

A food fight with a
gourmet critic?
Sounds boring.
Huh? Seriously?
I found a new shop.

Hurry up and decide
where we're
going already!
Wait a minute...
That's not right.

Nice. I'm gonna
post this online.

Why haven't you
been texting me
lately...?

Make sure to take
a good one!

That car looks
expensive.

It's a nice shop, so
why are the reviews
so bad?
Ah, right, right...

Since Miyazawa's
apology, a lot of
critics quit...

I don't trust food
critics. Not
after Miyazawa.

They're still talking
about Miyazawa? Who
even cares?

So Miyazawa screwed
over that little
ramen place?

Miyazawa ruined
Victory Kitchen's
flavor...?
I miss that izakaya.

Honey, I'm here!
Where are you?

Today I'll treat
myself to a steak.

I miss those
garlic-filled
dumplings.
Ramen... Ramen...
Ahh... Sooo full...
Sorry I'm late!

The shop's too
crowded. Where
should we go?

Drinks these days
come in all sorts of
weird flavors.

Let's get a drink
after we eat!
